Articles.Content:
I've been playing KSP for a while now and haven't experienced any technical issues until today. Last time I played was a few days ago (before the update I believe) and whenever I try to boot up the game now it will tell me it crashed and give me an error report. I've already deleted all my mods, reinstalled the game, and verified the game files. I also tried shutting down chrome to see if memory shortages were causing the issue but it still happens. I have tried both 64-bit and 32-bit versions and they both crash. Any ideas?

 

 

Here is a link to the bug report if that helps: https://pastebin.com/FXQLq1nF

I've attempted to run another game on steam and it has also crashed, this happens in other games as well and it appears to be happening from some direct3D issue. This does not appear to be a KSP issue, sorry.

Welcome to the Forum Salvage Marine, hopefully you'll be able to figure it out soon so you can start sending some Kerbals to space :).

I would start troubleshooting by the standard uninstall all graphics drivers and reinstall them.

9 hours ago, Noobton said:

Welcome to the Forum Salvage Marine, hopefully, you'll be able to figure it out soon so you can start sending some Kerbals to space :).

I would start troubleshooting by the standard uninstall all graphics drivers and reinstall them.

 

My graphics drivers ended up being out of date. Turns out I downloaded the new ones but forgot to install them.
